name: MemeStrategy
description: It is a deflationary token that converts BNB Chain meme volatility into buybacks and burns. Every trade contributes to a vault that automatically deploys into active BNB memes. When any position reaches +20%, it sells and uses 100% of profits to market-buy and burn $MEMESTR. The result is a perpetual cycle of volume, profit, and deflation â€” a system that rewards holders as the broader meme market moves.
